description: “My house, my rules.” Something I’ve heard since I was a little kid. And true, most of the times it’s big, powerful stepdaddy calling the shots. But other times, the sexy young sons of the house can sway how things are done. In this video, a super hot stepdaddy tells his boy that he needs to help him around the house, saying that because he’s grown, he has to take care of his responsibilities. He does what his old man says, taking care of yard work instead of hanging out with this friends… that is until he catches the bearded boss checking him out in the midday sun. Seeing that he has some power of him with his hot body, he gives the old man a taste of what he wants. And in exchange for getting to blow off his chores, the young man lets him blow his huge boy cock!
title: Yard Work RAW
